m_szDocTitle: Why Tesla Motors (TSLA) Stock Is Down Today - TheStreet
m_szDocSumamry: TheStreet Why Tesla Motors (TSLA) Stock Is Down Today By Andrew Meola | 10/15/14 - 02:50 PM EDT Reprint NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) -- Shares of Tesla Motors ( TSLA - Get Report ) were down 1.27% to $224.18 in afternoon trading Wednesday after the Michigan legislature passed House Bill 5606, which contains language that prevents Tesla from selling its electronic vehicles directly to customers within the home state of Ford ( F ) and General Motors ( GM ) . Republican Governor Rick Snyder has until October 21 to sign the bill. Tesla also faced a similar battle in New Jersey earlier this year when aut
